name: Yonge North York Self-Guided Foodie Tours
description:
Explore four unique, walkable experiences that showcase our neighbourhood's local gems, and vibrant restaurant venue, at your own pace. Whether you're a first-time visitor or a familiar local, our  curated tours are the perfect way to savour and enjoy our  district, one serving at a time.

Each tour includes four participating restaurants, offering exclusive tasting items. Complete a tour, collect our unique pins featuring local art, and upload pics of them for a chance to win prizes! Visit our website link to view each tour.

Funded by the City of Toronto's Transit Construction Mitigation Fund and the Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario
